detectors.description:
YGY.slitherConstructorVariables() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YGY__2.sol#13-66) uses literals with too many digits:
	- initialSupply = 100000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YGY__2.sol#15)
detectors.markdown:

detectors.description:

	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YGY__2.sol#8)

	- YGY.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YGY__2.sol#33-42)
